alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Pierce; Thurston; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 2:08AM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times this morning. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Thurston, Antelope, Pierce and Wayne Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...most of the snow accumulation will be before Noon, with amounts mostly less than an inch this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
